website_summaries.verdict: While designed specifically for triathlon participants, this award-winning wetsuit is comfortable and flexible enough for any water sport.
pros: Features light sleeves and good shoulder movement
cons: Runs a little small, so consider ordering up a size
Some customers say the neck is a little tight

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with my wetsuit purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with my wetsuit purchase. I really did a lot research before I bought this Synergy. There were $100 wetsuits and $800 wetsuits, and it was really hard to determine the differences. But after really "diving in" (pun intended) and getting to what you get for either price point, this Synergy was a great value for what I got. I had the opportunity to do a long open-water swim on Easter and the suit performed beautifully - great bouyancy with lots of stretch to move freely. I do not think you could go wrong with this mid-price point wetsuit. It's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Raduns

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8" and 170 lbs and the W3 fits perfectly. I'm especially happy that it should see me through to 150 lbs as I continue to lose weight. I've struggled with previous wet suits that were too constricting and difficult to put on. The Endorphin is easy to put on and take off for triathlons, no restriction in movement, especially in the arms and shoulders, and keeps me very comfortable in 50F water. I haven't had a chance to test it in colder temps yet. Thanks for the fast shipment, TriMonkey!
customer_reviews.author: Erika G

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with thicker/muscular arms and shoulders
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love it. I have been considering getting this suit for a while. I followed the size chart exactly (and read a lot of other reviews). I had no problem getting the legs and torso on... but the arms and shoulders were an absolute no go for me. I have been doing an arm/upper body workout at least 3-5 times a week so my arms and shoulders are fairly muscular. I also have naturally wide shoulders even when I don't work out, so that might also be a factor. If you have muscular arms and/or wide shoulders like me, this might not be for you. Otherwise I would have loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Aidia

customer_reviews.title: I can say that it fit me well and can be removed easily! I'm 5ft 112 Ibs and I have p2
customer_reviews.text: I wore this to my tri race in September. It's my first suit so I can't make a comparison. However, I can say that it fit me well and can be removed easily! I'm 5ft 112 Ibs and I have p2!
customer_reviews.author: icespade7

customer_reviews.title: this one is by far the best. She test swam last week and will race ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. She has competed in multiple triathlons, all with borrowed suits. Although those all 'fit' her, this one is by far the best. She test swam last week and will race in it this weekend. She noticed a distinguishable difference in the buoyancy, which I attribute to the thicker front panel. She had by far less arm restriction than the other two suits she has swam in. I used the sizing chart and the suit is right on. She is about 5'7" and 130 lbs and I purchased a W1, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BJH17

customer_reviews.title: Fits great! It doesn't feel constrictive at all
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous about ordering a wetsuit because of the tight neck and having it fit because I'm larger chested, but this fits great! It doesn't feel constrictive at all. I almost forgot I was wearing it during my race. I didn't feel any restriction in the shoulders either. It does take a bit to get it on before the swim, but comes off pretty easily. I have no basis of comparison to any different brands, but I really like this product and would recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: CPezzie

customer_reviews.title: Neck is too tight
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these to train and race my first triathlon. It worked great. My wife has decided she wants to try one. So I bought her the women's version of the wetsuit I had. But the first was too tight overall. The second fits well, except the neck is very high and presses into her skin uncomfortably. I tried mine on and saw that the collar is much lower down the shoulder than the women's version. I am going to have to return this suit and look for one that has a more comfortable neck. I don't think going up another size is possible. Too bad. I have been very happy with my men's suit.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ryan, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing short of AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this after swimming in 68 degree water. Should have bought this before I attempted such a feat. This is comfortable, easy to put on and take off. Instructions were clear and concise for easy care and cleaning. Swam in72 degree water feeling quite comfortable. Lots of room in the upper body and shoulder area as not to construct movement while swimming. Looks good on, really like the long strap on the zipper for easy of taking this off by myself. Great product. I also like that it is USAT approved.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wetsuit so I do not have anything to compare it to however I was very impressed with the quality of the suit. The 3 thickness zones allow for comfort, flexibility, and bouncy. It was easy to put on, I have only used it once so far. I had ordered a different brand but after waiting 3 weeks and still no shipment i cancelled the original and went with Synergy. Well worth the price. I thing I would change is to get a smaller size. I am 5.7 190lbs and busty. The WX is a tad large on me especially in the hips. I recommend this suit and the seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable isnt a word i use for wetsuits but..
customer_reviews.text: ...this was so comfortable! Easy to swim in and it doesn't choke me. After testing it out and having lots of water come in the neck I realized I hadn't tighten it correctly in the back. Once I got the hang of that it was perfection for me. I used it at the Ironman Lake Placid 70.3 and have had a several wetsuits over the years. This is my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Beachchic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buoyancy - love my wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wetsuit and great customer service! I am 5'4", 128lbs - I initially ordered a W1 which was too big and exchanged it for a P3 size which was perfect. The exchange was free and very easy. Plenty of float and flexibility, I swam a personal best this season with my Synergy wetsuit. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wetsuit I have worn as I am just getting into triathlons. I wasn’t really sure what to expect and really nervous about buying one online. I was amazed at how perfectly this fit! I am 5’4 135lbs and the W1 fit like a glove, seriously. I had no areas on my body that had extra folds or anything. It was so easy to swim with and I was very warm in 62 degree water. Pulling it off was a breeze. I am actually amazed that I found an affordable wetsuit that fit so perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Koeske

customer_reviews.title: The sleeves are VERY light with great shoulder mobility
customer_reviews.text: The fit may be a bit small. Mine was not comfortable through the chest/shoulders but the return was prompt and perfect. (I do have big shoulders and in their defense, it said add 7 lbs if your shoulders are larger). I swam in it this morning and think I'll love it. The sleeves are very light with good shoulder mobility. The torso and upper legs are very buoyant. I didn't swim a long distance in it as I had just finished a race.
customer_reviews.author: RuthannS

customer_reviews.title: Quality tri wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: This suit could very well be a five star but I won't know until I actually have the opportunity to swim in it. What I can attest to is its quality of construction and excellent fit...snug without being restricting. Looking forward to an open water swim soon!
customer_reviews.author: shbowa

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for an early summer open water tri in the northeast. Water temps were in the 50's. Other than my face, I was not cold or uncomfortable at all. It fit very nicely. It was easy to get on and off. I would definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rose

customer_reviews.title: she tells me it felt great with wonderful freedom of movement on the arms
customer_reviews.text: My wife needed a full body wetsuit - in a hurry - for an olympic distance event involving an unexpectedly cold New England river. She followed the producer sizing recommendations and the suit fit her perfectly. In the water, she tells me it felt great with wonderful freedom of movement on the arms. Seems to be very well put together, we'll have to see how it lasts. But thus far, five stars, no question.
customer_reviews.author: 02138 Shopper

customer_reviews.title: seams come apart
customer_reviews.text: although this suit is warm and comfy, after only 6 months of use the seams started to come apart. I called the company and even though their website warranty claims a 2 years refund or replacement for seam separation they would not stand behind that.i was very disappointed by that. all the seams at the shoulder started to separate....i do only normal swimming, no triathlon. so I think it should have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Purusha

customer_reviews.title: This wetsuit feels great! It's soft and conformable
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit feels great! It's soft and conformable. Very buoyant in the water. Makes me feel light and fast in the water. Because I am 5'0 and 160lbs I had to order a W3 according to their size chart. It did fit me, but is long in the legs and the arms. Some day I hope the manufacturers would consider "other" size suit now that triathletes are of all different sizes and shapes. I am looking forward to using this wetsuit during this years season.
customer_reviews.author: Marijo W

customer_reviews.title: ... this is my first wet suit and I am super pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: New to triathlons and this is my first wet suit and I am super pleased with it! It ran true to the size chart. I was able to try it on without any glide and it still fit fine. Snug, but not uncomfortable. I like the lower collar and the material around the neck is very soft and did not rub my skin, even after a 1 hour swim. It looks good on and made me feel better in open water. I am not sure what possibly could be better if you spent $800+ on a different suit. To me, this suit is an awesome bargain for the quality and I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene G Douthit

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: After trying on a friend's wetsuit I figured putting on a wetsuit was just supposed to be a work out in and of itself until I purchased the endorphin wetsuit. It is so easy to put on. I got size W1 and I love it. It goes on and off with very little effort. I probably could've got the smaller size, but for my first wetsuit I'm perfectly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love thus wetsuit! This is the third brand. I’m a triathlete and the range of motion in the shoulders is great! I’m also not a typical build for an athlete. I’m not skinny and I have a 36D chest. I was about to give up hope on finding a wetsuit that I could breath in until I tried Synergy. I’ve done several OWS in temps from 68-76. Highly recommend this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit! Love the color and the designs
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit! Love the color and the designs. Not as "floaty" as my regular 3/2 but definitely a better and quicker fit. Also I haven't experienced a rash on my neck from the rub, which is normal in my old suit.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Mom Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom because she gets cold in the water. Water does get in and it is supposed to BTW. You may need some assistance getting into this suit as it all made of some type of rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie RiosTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The product fit but the seam came unraveled.
customer_reviews.text: I had initially given this suit a five star but I have not had this suit for more than a week or so. I used it twice and noticed one of the seams was coming undone and a hole developed. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenius

customer_reviews.title: I had a lot of water draining out of my suit when I came into transition and my wetsuit stripper probably got her feet pretty wet. But it worked well for the swim
customer_reviews.text: This fits much looser than other wetsuits that I have had. Specifically there was a lot of water accumulating in the stomach and thighs area of the suit while I was swimming. I had a lot of water draining out of my suit when I came into transition and my wetsuit stripper probably got her feet pretty wet. But it worked well for the swim. Good range of movement in the arms.
customer_reviews.author: TippyTripod

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: My wife tried this on and it didn't fit for a person who is 6 feet tall. She ended up buying a man's wetsuit...and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Korak

customer_reviews.title: Durability.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed on this product! I wanted to use it for the first time and enjoy staying warm under water! First time use, it got torn (scratched)! I really wouldn't recommend spending almost $300 for something that is not durable at all!
customer_reviews.author: PARYA NICKBEEN

customer_reviews.title: Good material, good fit, very warm
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my wife, it fits perfectly! She loves it; kept her warm while night skiing on a like in February! High quality material, going to last us a long time. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Virocman

customer_reviews.title: Second Skin
customer_reviews.text: I finally got to use my new wetsuit after owning it a couple of months. LOVED it! As soon as I started moving in and out of the water, it felt like it was part of me. I registered it for the warranty but never heard from anyone. Hope all is good although I don’t expect any problems due to the quality of the craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda Orama

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with very reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wetsuit! Reasonably priced and great quality! I ordered from Amazon 1 week before my 70.3 triathlon and wore it only once before race day and it was awesome! This suit fit perfectly, with plenty of shoulder freedom! It is so much better than my previous suit I paid double the money for! I am very pleased with this purchase and will be purchasing a sleeveless suit as well for warmer races!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very Good feeling in open water!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Very comfortable to swim in open water. I didn’t want to spend so much money on this, knowing that I will wear it only a few days a year. And it was a very good surprise.
customer_reviews.author: ERICA LIJTZTAIN

customer_reviews.title: Dream come true.
customer_reviews.text: Oh, this is the best wetsuit I could hope for. I can never, ever buy one-piece clothing (in general), because I'm tall and thin, but this wetsuit fits perfectly. I am 5'10 and 120lbs and the W1 works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for me. I looked at many of the more expensive suits but in the end frugality won. Happy with my choice
customer_reviews.author: gio

customer_reviews.title: I haven't swam in it yet, but it's quite comfortable on dry land.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second wetsuit I have purchased. The first was hard to put on and worse to swim in. This one is easier to put on and I have yet to swim in it. If it works, and I hope it will, I would give it 5 stars. Wanted to update my review to 5 stars. Swam today, good shoulder flexibility, comfortable. Fit my hourglass shape. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Super Granny

customer_reviews.title: Open Swimmer Newbie
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wetsuit as I have just started competing in open water swims. I live in the northeast, and intend on using the suit in a week. I chose the Synergy Endorphin based on others experiences and reviews. It fits quite tightly, as I have been told it should snug your body. Excited to try it out and swim on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The suit is awesome. Very buoyant and thick and warm
customer_reviews.text: The suit is awesome. Very buoyant and thick and warm. I am 5'10, 175 but very muscular, and went with the WX after debating between that and the W3. The WX fits perfect, if not even a little too tight; Might be because I have a very large torso. But overall, its great for the ocean swims of triathlons in the Northeast!
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great range of motion in the arms, despite the thickness.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this wetsuit for a cold swim... Ironman Arizona. The thicker sleeves are important to me. I finally got a chance to try the wetsuit in open water in Florida's northern Gulf. It was a very choppy day. The Synergy wetsuit kept me very buoyant! It was difficult to get vertical because of the buoyancy in the legs!
customer_reviews.author: Alison G. Thielmann

customer_reviews.title: Love how this wetsuit fits me better compared to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used only once so far in an open water practice. Love how this wetsuit fits me better compared to my Xterra Vortex. With the Xterra wetsuit, it would feel like a ton of water coming out from the legs as I would exit the water, but I did not have that experience with the Syngery. The neck on the Syngery also feels less constricting. Looking forward to many more swims with this wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: MOR

customer_reviews.title: I'm very comfortable in it
customer_reviews.text: First size ordered was too tight; I didn't account for the stomach!! First time ever in a wetsuit but after patience and several times on, I'm very comfortable in it! No chafing areas and I've been in the open water with it. Bought 3 others for my daughters!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great performing wetsuit for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this wetsuit. I am a novice triathlete, and bought this for my first sprit Tri. I was skeptical knowing many invest in more expensive wetsuits, but when I tried this suit on and took it for a swim, I was amazed at how well it fit, and how much range of motion I had in the upper body (I’m also not a strong swimmer). Thank you Synergy Wetsuits!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome size options and stretchy fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 2 mile open water swim. As a larger woman, suits in my size were hard to find. I also didn’t want to spend a fortune. This suit is perfect! It’s stretchy and comfortable with full range of motion. I’ve used it 3 times and the quality is good. Thank you Synergy for creating a great suit for larger people!
customer_reviews.author: btru2u

customer_reviews.title: A great suit. Can't wait to try it again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the P3 full wetsuit for women. I haven't had the opportunity to use it in open water yet, but I did take it to the pool. I enjoyed it immensely and swam roughly 30% faster with little effort. My arms/shoulders had full range of motion. I watched the link on YouTube about how to put it on. It was relatively simple but the neck space still didn't seem very spacious and I felt it was a tad constrictive. This is likely my error not the suit.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Utley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This suit feels great and it is so easy to put on and take off. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: hillary becton

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wetsuit! The fit was right on with the sizing chart which was perfect. Also I needed it overnight for an open water swim the following day and they delivered as requested without a huge delivery fee. I would highly recommend this wetsuit, it kept me warm, was easy to swim in and was super buoyant!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buoyant
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my first one. What a step up. Lots of shoulder flexibility. Easy on and off. Fits to size chart (for me). I did not expect the added buoyancy through the core. I was pleasantly surprised. It gave my mind added peace for the Lake Huron swims.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: In la la LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Hands down tried so many brands none fit comfortable or suited my height/measurments this brand is AMAZING and really keeps the costumer in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I exactly followed the size chart, but it was small and short. And it was very hard to wear...
customer_reviews.author: Jee Young Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: First tri wetsuit I have bought in 17 years. Decided to get back to ocean swimming on my 67 birthday. W3 fit like a dream(although I can’t zip it by myself yet). I’m 5’8”, 160 lbs. First swim yesterday. Warm and comfortable in 60 degree ocean. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonseyb

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit for colder water swims
customer_reviews.text: Have had this wetsuit now for about ten open water swims. Have been swimming in Colorado reservoirs, water about 65 - 68 degrees. Super comfortable, easy to put on. Sizing was perfect. I would recommend this for anyone. Arrived quickly! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: allison therwhanger

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice wetsuit. Becareful with your fingernails when trying to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and stretchy material
customer_reviews.text: Used the sizing chart and when the wetsuit arrived it fit perfectly. Haven't used it yet (tri sprint coming up), but looking forward to it! Super soft and stretchy material, allows full movement of the arms and legs. Easy to zip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Perfect tri wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Love this wetsuit so much! Full range of motion in water and gives perfect buoyancy in OWS. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shorter torso
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit short in terms of torso to arms and length but is a great wetsuit. Sadly just not for medium/longer torso'd people
customer_reviews.author: Julian Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Fits great! I'm 5'7" and about 150
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! I'm 5'7" and about 150. The W2 fits perfect. The suit is comfortable and kept me warm on a swim in 55 degeee water. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for swimming long distances -- no tightness in the arms or shoulders. Easy to put on and take off. Nice, snug fit. Very warm, even in 57 degree ocean. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: DanC

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, even for the coldest water!
customer_reviews.text: Love my suit! Best service from the time you order, follow up etc. Size chart is really good and helpful. I'm 1.70 and 58 k (metric units ), and got the W1. Fits great! I use the suit for swimming at a lake that is under 12 degrees Celsius!
customer_reviews.author: Devorairene

customer_reviews.title: Great fit after I learned how to put it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit after I learned how to put it on inside out! I am 4 ft 11 and weigh about 124. It takes a bit of time to learn how to put it on properly. Good movement in arms, legs, etc. Is not hard getting off. Add quite a bit of floatation advantage for swimming in hips!
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: I am a medium and needed a large! Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I like the room in the shoulders , felt less restrictive . The neck fits well , not too tight. A wetsuit takes getting used to no matter what!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli stone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!!  ⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. My first wetsuit. Highly recommend. Beautifully made. Synergy website sizing instructions are 5 ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Carmen 'n Seattle

customer_reviews.title: The wetsuit was a perfect fit & well designed & made
customer_reviews.text: The wetsuit was a perfect fit & well designed & made. The only issue I had was that I thought I could use it in the swimming pool as temperatures got cooler, but was not able to stay much on top of the water as I kept sinking down, for the ocean it's perfect but not for a swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amita Patel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Water coming through the zipper was cold but ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Water coming through the zipper was cold but the suit kept me much warmer than a previous suit I bought. I really like the material and fit. It barely let any water in except where the zipper is. I would definitely purchase this again or recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Larson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6" 155 pounds and the wetsuit fits perfectly. It got delivered just a couple of days after I ordered it. It keeps nice and comfortable when I swim. They included a swim cap with the order. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Camille L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner triathletes who aren't ready to make a ...
customer_reviews.text: It is everything I wanted it to be! Great for beginner triathletes who aren't ready to make a large financial commitment to some of the more expensive suits.
customer_reviews.author: huske1ra

customer_reviews.title: However Synergy was great in recommending sizing
customer_reviews.text: The first wetsuit we received turned out to be too small. However Synergy was great in recommending sizing, processing the return and sending us the right size. Have been using the suit now for the last month or so for open water swimming and absolutely no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: This wetsuit is great. I just swam in 55 degree water and ...
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is great. I just swam in 55 degree water and I was able to do it with this wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Card

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Motion made this a Great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult deciding what size to chose. I had go try one on in a dive shop so I could calculate what size to buy but it was perfect when I did! Great suit and kept me comfortable while swimming in open water. The ease of motion in the shoulders and knees was great.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Voydat

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit...perfect first fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect! The sizing guide was spot on. Suit is easy to get on and off and kept me super warm. No neck chafing...cut perfectly and strokes were easy and smooth. Buoyancy and glide effects awesome...highly recommend this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Meeghan O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Fits me true to the size chart! Good quality, used it for a triathlon swim already!
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Momma

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfectly and was very easy to swim in
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly and was very easy to swim in. Plus I love how it made me look! It's supposed to be very tight, and it was at first, but it loosened up after I wore and swam in it once. Did not restrict my range of motion at all.
customer_reviews.author: MaryC3

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to get on and off, great fit!
customer_reviews.author: A. Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and warm, you'll forget you're wearing a wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is easy to get on and off, flexible and warm, so comfortable I forgot I was even wearing a wetsuit. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Blue

customer_reviews.title: To call customer service BEFORE you order!  Do not go by chart!
customer_reviews.text: The size chart is totally off! I ordered up a size because of what all the reviews said. Well I still couldn’t get it over my hips and I am not big hipped!
customer_reviews.author: David Battisto

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: The fitting guide worked perfect. The suit is very comfortable with great range of motion in the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice suit- well made and good quality. The buoyancy is amazing! Can't wait to use it in my first tri.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: She loved it and it fit perfectly.. Made her whole Christmas.. Thank you.. M.Benson
customer_reviews.author: michael Benson

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to try it out!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had an opportunity to use it in the water yet, but it seems easy to get on & off (I did watch the video provided on their website, which helped). Neck is a little tight, but I know that is typical of most wetsuits.
customer_reviews.author: jf2136

customer_reviews.title: terrific fit
customer_reviews.text: I am new to triathlon and this suit has been perfect, reviews lived up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: I love this wet suit
customer_reviews.text: I love this wet suit. I just did my first triathlon and The water was so cold but with my wetsuit I was fine. It fit like a glove and gave me enough buoyancy that I felt very confident in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought used from Amazon warehouse and it came in great condition. Following the brand sizing chart gave me a perfect fit. I am a beginner triathlete and am very happy with this suit and with Amazon warehouse!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit!!
customer_reviews.text: Did my first Triathlon with this suit and it was a great experience. Suit is easy to get on and off and has the right amount of buoyancy. The suit runs small based on the size chart so order one size up. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: soft , flexibel and warm
customer_reviews.text: I use this wetsuit to train during the winter . Perfect
customer_reviews.author: maia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits super tight and stretchy which is what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: snowpuppy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suit. Didn't restrict shoulders or neck while swimming
customer_reviews.text: Awesome suit. Didn't restrict shoulders or neck while swimming. Debated on which suit to go with for awhile. Glad I decided on the synergy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Smith

customer_reviews.title: love it! its comfortable
customer_reviews.text: love it! its comfortable, true to size, flexible, and high quality. I noticed a huge difference from my sleeveless "aquaman". great price point too! i'm faster in this suit in open water than i am in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product is really good. It keeped me warm during my early morning ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6", 130lb and bought size P3 wetsuit which fits perfectly on me. I used it for my 1st triathlon and had no problem to put on or take off. The quality of the product is really good. It keeped me warm during my early morning ocean swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wetsuit arrived last week and it looks great. I tried it on and it seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: My wetsuit arrived last week and it looks great. I tried it on and it seems to be the right fit - I just followed guidance on the manufacturer's website. I haven't tried using it in water yet so cannot comment on how it would actually perform.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit. True to size. Super buoyant as well. However, I returned the long sleeve for a sleeveless. Works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wetsuit for Triathletes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wetsuit! Easy on and off, soft, comfortable, great fit and price! Followed the size chart and very satisfied. I will recommend to my fellow triathletes.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dollhopf

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy. Easy to swim in
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. went with prior reviews and ordered a Medium rather than a large. Very Happy. Easy to swim in. Used for a triathlon.
customer_reviews.author: tracey clark

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: The only company I found that provides my fit. I'm 5'11 and very lean so the W2 was the closest choice. Fits perfectly, great quality and easily put on and off which is a necessity for a quick transition in triathlon. Looking forward to wearing it for my first race this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Mira Chepas

customer_reviews.title: It's fast and pretty easy to get in and out of
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this wetsuit! It's fast and pretty easy to get in and out of. I am doing my first 70.3 in a couple of weeks and I believe this is going to be great wetsuit for that.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Terry

customer_reviews.title: This suit is perfect! It fit like a glove and was extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: This suit is perfect! It fit like a glove and was extremely comfortable. Swimming in the bay was a treat, thanks to having a great wetsuit!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S. Fruneaux

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely - can't wait to try it out in the lake
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ware

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on and off. Enough room for arm movement
customer_reviews.author: Maryland bike girl

customer_reviews.title: Just what we ordered!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect. Price was perfect and the shipping was super fast.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wetsuit! I wear it in 54 degree open ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wetsuit! I wear it in 54 degree open water swimming and it keeps me warm. Sizing chart is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: tennischick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and keeps me nice and warm in the cold Michigan lakes.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Hollyer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with this wet-suit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this wet-suit, easy to put on, super flexible. Swimming with a wet-suit is a total different experience but the fact that this one is so flexible makes it so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: JMKC

customer_reviews.title: but it fit perfect and was exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous ordering my triathlon wetsuit online, but it fit perfect and was exactly what I expected. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! The fit was a bit large
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my first triathlon. Loved it! The fit was a bit large, but I ordered a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Katyhryn Ellis

product_meta.title: Synergy Triathlon Wetsuit 5/3mm - Women's Endorphin Full Sleeve Smoothskin Neoprene for Open Water Swimming Ironman & USAT Approved
feature_bullets: TRIATHLETE MAGAZINE EDITOR'S CHOICE AWARD WINNER / LAVA MAGAZINE BEST VALUE WETSUIT – Suitable for all levels. Ironman & USAT approved. Athlete endorsed. Comes in wide range of sizes to ensure a perfect fit.

PROVEN TECHNOLOGY EQUALS SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE – Hydrodynamic neoprene made from Yamamoto #39 with SCS silicone coated SyPrene. 5mm thick core buoyancy panel / 3mm lower legs and back / 2mm arms and shoulders.

EXCEPTIONAL FUNCTIONALITY – Full range of motion. Unsurpassed 680 percent flexibility. Highest grade anti corrode internal wetsuit zipper from YKK which greatly reduces drag as you move through the water. Super soft low neck with smoothskin on both sides and because it is so soft, it feels like you hardly have anything around your neck.

MAXIMUM BUOYANCY - 5mm wetsuit, which is the maximum buoyancy allowed in triathlon wetsuits. Creates nearly double the buoyancy than 3mm suits, which are not recommended for cold waters. Float higher. Move faster. Save energy.

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION - 30-Day Guarantee: If you are not 100% satisfied within 30-days, send your new/unused wetsuit back for a full refund / 2 Year Warranty / Lifetime Replacement Guarantee (allows end-user to send in their used wetsuit at any time and receive 40% off MSRP).
